scripts.ds:rollup: rm -rf dist && rm -rf .rollup.cache && NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 node scripts/build-prd && node scripts/hds-prefix
scripts.ds:build:css: sass src/assets/scss/hmg-design-system-style-guide.module.scss --no-source-map --quiet dist/index_output.css && postcss dist/index_output.css -o dist/index.css --no-map && rm dist/index_output.css
scripts.ds:build:hds:css: sass src/assets/scss/hmg-design-system-style-guide.module.scss --no-source-map --quiet dist/hds_output.css && cp postcss.hds.config.js postcss.config.js && postcss dist/hds_output.css -o dist/hds_index.css --no-map && cp postcss.origin.config.js postcss.config.js && rm dist/hds_output.css dist/hds_output.css.json
scripts.ds:build:scope:css: sass src/assets/scss/hmg-design-system-style-guide-scope.module.scss --no-source-map --quiet dist/scope_output.css && postcss dist/scope_output.css -o dist/scope_index.css --no-map && rm dist/scope_output.css
scripts.ds:build:gw:css: sass src/assets/scss/hmg-design-system-style-guide-scope-gw.module.scss --no-source-map --quiet dist/gw_output.css && postcss dist/gw_output.css -o dist/gw_index.css --no-map && rm dist/gw_output.css
